title: IScrewMateFeatureData.EntitiesToMate
description: Gets or sets the entities to mate in this screw mate feature.
returns: Array of two cylindrical faces of the two components to mate (see Remarks )
remarks:
Instead of specifying this property, you can use
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
to pre-select the entities to mate using Mark = 1 for each entity. You can pre-select mate entities during mate creation, but not during mate editing.
